item.title: [AoC 2023] Dia 1: Vencendo com Lookaround üëÄ
item.description:
Ontem se iniciou mais um Advent of Code e dessa vez farei meu melhor para durar mais do que dois dias üôè.
O enunciado do primeiro desafio pode ser lido aqui: https://adventofcode.com/2023/day/1

item.title: Histogram Equalization
item.description: This is a Digital Image Processing technique to improve contrast in an image.

item.title: Skip GitHub Actions CI
item.description: Add `[no ci]` to a commit message and it will skip GitHub CI.

item.title: Symbol protects React from XSS attacks
item.description: If your server has a hole that lets the user store an arbitrary JSON object while the client code expects a string, React would be vulnerable to an XSS attack.

item.title: location.replace() removes current page from the browser history
item.description: Found out about this after clicking an exteral link in a page and not being able to go back to the source. How could a link behave like that? Turns out that it was a button with location.replace() for its onClick event.

item.title: Emails can contain apostrophes
item.description: As stated in RFC 3696, apostrophes can be used before the @

item.title: yarn run displays all available commands
item.description: yarn run will display all available binary scripts and user defined scripts from the package.json file.
